about.description: Hello! I'm <strong> ANTOINE<strong>. Engineering student at ESIEA, specializing in Software Engineering, Entrepreneurship, and Innovation. Currently Product Owner at Meta-Coaching, I bridge business and tech, managing Agile teams, product evolution, and platform maintenance. Passionate about technology and innovation, I thrive on solving complex challenges

cv.intro: Hello! I am John Smith. I work as an interface and front-end developer. I have a passion for pixel-perfect, minimal, and easy-to-use interfaces.

work.description1: Developed and maintained the company's website and internal tools.
work.description2: Implemented new UI/UX designs and improved website responsiveness.
